theme.name: Cinematic Nostalgia
theme.description: An intimate, texture-rich aesthetic that feels like a digital scrapbook or a high-end cinema experience. Avoids generic 'tech' looks in favor of warmth, grain, and emotion.

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts: Playfair Display (400, 700), Lato (400, 700), Dancing Script (400, 700)

grid_system.memory_viewer: flex flex-col h-screen overflow-hidden snap-y snap-mandatory

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-serif tracking-wide hover:bg-primary-800 transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: border border-primary text-primary bg-transparent rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-serif hover:bg-primary-50 transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-primary hover:text-primary-800 hover:bg-primary-50/50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.memory_card: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/40 shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] rounded-xl p-6 hover:rotate-1 transition-transform duration-300
cards.admin_stat: bg-white border border-gray-100 shadow-sm rounded-xl p-6

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-primary/20 focus:border-primary px-0 py-2 outline-none transition-colors placeholder:text-gray-400 font-serif text-lg w-full

assets.icons: Lucide React (Heart, Lock, Play, Pause, Share2, Calendar, Image, Video)

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on image backgrounds has a semi-transparent overlay or text-shadow.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus ring with color-primary-400 offset-2

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a romantic memory sharing app. The vibe is 'Digital Scrapbook'. Use the provided textures and fonts to create warmth. Do not make it look like a corporate dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.admin_panel: Keep it clean but use the 'Paper' background color (#F5F2EB) instead of stark white. Use serif fonts for headings even in the admin panel.
instructions_to_main_agent.memory_viewer: This is the core experience. It should feel like a slideshow. Use full-screen images with text overlays. Use the 'texture_overlay' on all pages to give a grain effect.
instructions_to_main_agent.rtl_support: Ensure all layouts support RTL (Right-to-Left) for Arabic content. Use logical properties (ms-*, me-*) or Tailwind's rtl: modifiers.
instructions_to_main_agent.mock_data: Use the provided image URLs for mock data in the memory viewer.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
